question: How did the state of the container change?
options: The container was taken out of the cupboard and emptied of its contents.
The container was lifted off the table and turned upside down.
The container was moved to the counter and filled with grains.
The container was placed in the sink and filled with water.
The container was set on the floor and partially filled with ice.

inference.prompt:

(B) The container was lifted off the table and turned upside down.
